<%= @app_name %> Documentation

All documentation generated for your installed versions of Ext JS, Ext MVC and the <%= @app_name %> application itself are to the left.

To regenerate documentation, run `ruby script/build docs` from within your application's base directory

This documentation can be customised by updating the config/settings.yml file for your app, for example: 

environment:
  name: The name of your app
docs:
  title: The title to use in documentation (currently <%= @app_name %>)
  logo: URL of the logo to display at top right (currently <%= @logo %>)
